work.position: Senior Web Developer & Web Project Strategist
work.summary: Design and develop client projects ranging from user experience updates, strategy & prototypes to plugins and web applications.
highlights: Project Management: Identify needs, feasibility, cordinate departments and set timelines
Work with client data to extend existing solutions (plugin development/schema implementation)
integrating 3rd party applications (Mailchimpm lists/SAP catalogues/Measurement tools)

work.summary: Worked as technical lead designing for various e-commerce storefronts, maintaining and deploying to an array of backend systems, instructing & training franchisees/employees and advising management on new technical solutions.
highlights: Advisory: Walking franchisees through our technical stack, building and giving web presentations to employees and hosting private training and Q&A sessions for sales.

Web Development & Design: Launching & maintaining proprietary and franchisee presences on e-commerce platforms including BigCommerce, eBay & Amazon stores focusing on storefront design, API interactions, product catalogue asset management and asset optimization.

Database: All tasks relating to proprietary and franchisee databases including automating & troubleshooting static & API-driven imports, supplier priority chains for automating pricing & shipping calculations.

work.summary: Worked with marketing teams to help build and deploy client solutions including HTML ads and stable marketing email campaigns.
highlights: Developing websites on a LAMP stack (Linux, Apache, MySQL and PHP)
Developed website front ends using HTML, CSS and Javascript
Designing and delivering HTML ads for client campaigns

skills.name: Web Development
keywords: many more but these are my favorite.
